modifiers.information-society: thankful for being born into the Information Society
modifiers.dont-fall: who doesn't fall for the same type twice
modifiers.immerse: who is immersed most of the time

About.title: About
About.p1: Even when I went to a foreign language high school, I always liked to deal with computers to the extent that I read 『The Essence of Language C』 as a hobby, but I had to come to college to think that I could make a developer a job. The moment I entered the Linux command in 42 Seoul, where I just went to play, I felt relieved that I found something I could like for the rest of my life.
About.p2: I spend most of my time coding, but I often play the piano when I'm bored. I enjoy reading books on philosophy, international politics, and futurology. Since it is an information society, I want to faithfully understand what is happening and enjoy the new technology.

42Stat.title: 42Stat
42Stat.description: Dashboard-type web service that shows statistics of 42 Seoul trainees

CerebriClass.title: Cerebri Class
CerebriClass.description: A service that creates a Word study paper by generating a problem when you enter an English word
CerebriClass.startup-mvp: Developed simply by receiving an MVP production request from a startup
